pullrequest.title: Prevent xml parser error from crashing LogPlay on osx -> gazebo7

content.raw:
I noticed that this test has been failing on our 32-bit trusty build on default, so I made a duplicate jenkins job to test this branch. It seems to still be failing:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-i386-gpu-none_temp/2/testReport/%28root%29/LogPlay_TEST/NoEndTag/

My approval still stands. Maybe @\_jrivero_ can advise how we could set up a 32-bit trusty docker image to reproduce this failure?
content.html:
I noticed that this test has been failing on our 32-bit trusty build on default, so I made a duplicate jenkins job to test this branch. It seems to still be failing:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-i386-gpu-none_temp/2/testReport/%28root%29/LogPlay_TEST/NoEndTag/

My approval still stands. Maybe @_jrivero_ can advise how we could set up a 32-bit trusty docker image to reproduce this failure?
